title: News digest [No. 13]
brief_description: Cinemagazine items: Money makers produce decimal coins at Bendigo; Mt. Scurvy will disappear if quarrying continues by 1984; Tuna - a new catch in new nets off the Gippsland Lakes worth 8,000 pounds per annum; two kinds of art - Eskimos stone carvings and needlework; Erwen Ponds clear spring water attracts divers and grows huge water lilies.
